Name: oprcom
Description: Commutator of this\n operator, if any

Name: oprnegate
Description: Negator of this operator,\n if any

Name: oprlsortop
Description: If this operator supports\n merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the left-hand operand

Name: oprrsortop
Description: If this operator supports\n merge joins, the operator that sorts the type of the right-hand operand

Name: oprrest
Description: Restriction selectivity\n estimation function for this operator

Name: oprjoin
Description: Join selectivity estimation\n function for this operator
